item.description:
I have to man the front desk tonight @ Artisan's Asylum, but I'm dragging my laptop and some music gear to hack on while there. If you're in the area and want to stop by and chat music, feel free! This is a tiny version of the upcoming February meetup...so you can get a feel for the venue if you like.

Tonight is about talking shop, not performance. Save your noise for February, but swing by if you want to chat it up. Always happy to meet with folks!
item.name: EXTRA! Late Breaking Micro Meet @ Artisan's Asylum - TONIGHT 7pm
